SqlCredential.summary: provides a more secure way to specify the password for a login attempt using SQL Server Authentication. is comprised of a user id and a password that will be used for SQL Server Authentication. The password in a object is of type . cannot be inherited. Windows Authentication (Integrated Security = true) remains the most secure way to log in to a SQL Server database.
